title: HoP 277 - Trivial Pursuits - Fourteenth Century Logic
itunes:title: HoP 277 - Trivial Pursuits - Fourteenth Century Logic
description: The scholastics discuss the ambiguity of terms, the nature of logical inference, and logical paradoxes, and play the game of “obligations.”
